title: Southport/Wrigleyville/Lakview/Blaine 3 br/2 bath (Sept 1)
posting_body: ft.) remodeled vintage-style apartment in quiet, well-maintained brick two-flat on oversized lot.
Unit features living room, formal dining room, eat-in kitchen, 2 remodeled bathrooms, 3 large bedrooms with sizeable closets, and a large sunroom.
Other features include hardwood floors, two built-in vintage wood hutches, AC, ceiling fans, wood blinds throughout, coin-free W+D in building, secure storage room, backyard.
Located in BLAINE ELEMENTARY SCHOOL DISTRICT and near the Juniper Playlot/Park, Jewel/CVS, the Music Box Theater, restaurants, and the Southport Brown Line 'L' stop.
Call Gregory at 773-805-1984 for more information or to arrange a showing.
